alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Western Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bergen and Rockland Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pearl River, or near Ramsey, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New City, Paramus, Ridgewood, Monsey, Nanuet, Ramsey, Suffern, Nyack, Tappan, Pearl River, Oradell, Norwood, Orangeburg, Pomona and Upper Nyack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
